Description: Magical gem; intaglio; haematite; oval; engraved on obverse: Osiris-mummy wearing crown of Upper Egypt and holding staff; inscribed.
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (4)
Bonner 1950 / Studies in magical amulets, chiefly Graeco-Egyptian
